TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ApplicationIDAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ApplicationIDAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ApplicationIDAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定這個組件的應用程式識別碼 (稱為 GUID)。

span.span: Specifies the application ID (as a GUID) for this assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會在其建構函式中的 GUID。 takes a GUID in its constructor. 註冊時，組件中的元件會安裝在具有指定 ID 的應用程式When registration occurs, the components in the assembly are installed in an application with the given ID. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用型別。The following code example demonstrates the use of the type.
